components/category/sidebar:
{{#if category.subcategories}}
{{category.name}}
    {{#each category.subcategories}}
  • {{name}}
    • {{/each}}
{{/if}} {{#if category.faceted_search_enabled}} {{#unless category.facets }} {{else}} {{> components/faceted-search/index category}} {{/unless}} {{else}} {{> components/category/shop-by-price shop_by_price=category.shop_by_price category_url=category.url}} {{/if}}
components/faceted-search/index:
{{> components/faceted-search/selected-facets this.selected}} {{#if facets.length '>' 2}} {{lang 'search.faceted.browse-by'}} {{{ join (pluck facets 'title') ', ' limit=2 }}} & {{ toLowerCase (lang 'search.faceted.more') }} {{/if}} {{#if facets.length '<=' 2}} {{lang 'search.faceted.browse-by'}} {{{ join (pluck facets 'title') ', ' lastSeparator=' & ' }}} {{/if}} {{lang 'search.faceted.hide-filters'}} {{lang 'search.faceted.show-filters'}} {{#any facets visible=true}}
{{#each facets}} {{#if visible}} {{{dynamicComponent 'components/faceted-search/facets'}}} {{/if}} {{/each}}
{{/any}}
{{> components/faceted-search/adapter/facet-adapter }}
components/faceted-search/selected-facet:
{{lang 'search.faceted.selected.title'}}
{{#if this.items}}
    {{#each this.items}}
  • {{#if facet '===' 'rating'}} {{lang 'search.faceted.selected.rating-label' rating=title}} {{else}} {{{ title }}} {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{else}} {{lang 'search.faceted.selected.no-filters'}} {{/if}} {{#if remove_all_url}} {{lang 'search.faceted.selected.clear-all'}} {{/if}}
components/faceted-search/facets/hierarc:
{{#each this}}
  • {{{sanitize title}}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}} {{#if count}} ({{count}}) {{/if}} {{/if}} {{#if children}} {{> components/faceted-search/facets/hierarchy-children children}} {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
components/faceted-search/facets/multi:
{{#if items}}
{{ title }}
{{#if selected}} {{lang 'search.faceted.clear'}} {{/if}}
{{#if title '==' 'LITERS'}} {{> components/faceted-search/adapter/multi-slider remove_url=remove_url }} {{else}}
    {{#each items}}
  • {{{sanitize title}}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}} ({{ count }}) {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{#if show_more_toggle}} {{lang 'search.faceted.show-more'}} {{/if}}
{{/if}}
{{/if}}
components/faceted-search/facets/range:
{{ title }}
{{#if selected}} {{lang 'search.faceted.clear'}} {{/if}}
{{#each current_selected_items}} {{/each}} {{#if sort}} {{/if}}
components/faceted-search/facets/rating:
{{#if items}}
{{ title }}
{{#if selected}} {{lang 'search.faceted.clear'}} {{/if}}
    {{#each items}}
  • {{> components/products/ratings rating=title}} {{lang 'search.faceted.rating.and-up'}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}} ({{ count }}) {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{/if}}
